response.final_text:
I don’t have a tool named "nonexistent_tool." I can’t call tools that don’t exist, but I can help using the tools I do have. Available tools here:

- get_current_time — return current date/time
- calculator — evaluate math expressions
- request_approval — ask a human for approval before a sensitive action
- multi_tool_use.parallel — run multiple of the above in parallel

What do you want to do? If you tell me the intended action, I can:
- map it to one of the available tools and run it, or
- suggest an alternative solution and proceed with your confirmation.
